example_queries: My phone is not charging even with a new charger.
Battery percentage stuck while charging.
solution: Check the charging cable and adapter, clean the charging port, try a different power source, and restart the phone. If still not working, the charging port or battery may need service.

example_queries: Internet not working on my phone.
4G/LTE is not connecting.
solution: Turn airplane mode on/off, reset network settings, reinsert SIM card, and check with your service provider.

example_queries: My laptop is very slow while browsing.
System takes too long to boot.
solution: Clear temporary files, uninstall unused apps, increase RAM if possible, and scan for malware.

example_queries: Some laptop keys are not typing.
Keyboard stopped responding.
solution: Restart the laptop, update keyboard drivers, try an external keyboard. If issue persists, the keyboard may need replacement.

example_queries: My TV turns on but shows no display.
There is sound but no picture on my TV.
solution: Check HDMI/cable connections, restart the TV, try a different input source, and adjust brightness settings. If issue continues, the display panel may be faulty.

example_queries: My smart TV won't connect to Wi-Fi.
TV says no internet connection.
solution: Restart the router and TV, re-enter Wi-Fi password, and update TV firmware. If still failing, reset network settings.

example_queries: Washing machine drum is not rotating.
Clothes come out wet after wash.
solution: Check if the load is balanced, ensure lid/door is properly closed, and clean the filter. If still not spinning, motor or belt may need service.

example_queries: Washing machine showing drain error.
Water stuck inside the drum.
solution: Clean the drain pump filter, check the hose for blockages, and restart the machine.

example_queries: My refrigerator is running but not cooling.
Freezer works but fridge is warm.
solution: Check temperature settings, clean condenser coils, and ensure doors are sealed. If issue persists, gas refill or compressor repair may be needed.

example_queries: Refrigerator stopped working suddenly.
Lights inside the fridge are off.
solution: Check power supply, verify plug and socket, reset the circuit breaker, and test with another outlet.
